text:
@BorisJohnson Lovely and very good to see you back Prime Minister.. Mr Boris Johnson. We need to know now how long lockdown continues?  However without a second spike of Coronavirus (Covid-19) at some future point in time; like the Spanish Flu 1918-1920
Thank you.
